channel.title: Mtp v2 / New-Era
channel.description:
I want so you cant teleport in combat -.-... idk which file...
also i need a ::kdr command. alot of my players like to keep count of thier kdr. thanks.

item.title: Mtp v2 / New-Era
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

To add kills to death ration, you could simply do this:

double ratio = ((double)c.killCount)/((double)c.deathCount);
c.sendMessage("You currently have " + c.killCount + " kills, and " + c.deathCount + " deaths.");
c.sendMessage("Your kills to death ratio is: " + ratio + ".");

That would be if you used the variables ‘killCount’ and ‘deathCount’ to store the death and kill integers to each character.

Read full topic
